title: Creating Polygons to Fill Under 3D Line Graph
description: In this tutorial, we will learn how to create polygons which fill the space under a line graph in a 3D plot using Python's Matplotlib library. The polygons will be semi-transparent, creating a sort of 'jagged stained glass' effect.
